title: Create a new deployment for UD/UCMDB
content:
You can use the tool provided by OMT to create a deployment to get namespace, default certificate, and service account prepared for installing an application by Helm charts.

  1. Log in to the bastion node and navigate to the OMT installation directory: 
    cd OMT_External_K8s_2x.x-xxx/scripts/
  2. Run the following commands to create an ITOM application deployment: 
    ./cdfctl.sh deployment create -t helm -d <UD/UCMDB DEPLOYMENT NAME> [-n <UD/UCMDB NAMESPACE>]
    The -n option is optional. If you don't specify this option, the command will create a namespace that uses the deployment name you specified for the -d option. However, you can specify the -n option if you want to use a custom namespace.

    For example: 
    ./cdfctl.sh deployment create -t helm -d ucmdb-prod

    A message that resembles the following indicates that you have installed the application deployment successfully. 
    2023-04-07T06:59:05Z INFO Creating deployment ... name=ucmdb-prod namespace=ucmdb-prod
2023-04-07T06:59:05Z INFO Created namespace "ucmdb-prod" ...
2023-04-07T06:59:05Z INFO Successfully created deployment "ucmdb-prod" uuid=72cf3a15-2f5e-4a36-af61-75aead1d00f0
    To view more options of the cdfctl.sh script, run ./cdfctl.sh deployment -h.
